caption.p: (a) The score plot presented five data clusters in different color, where each dot represents one time point. The clustering is attributable as: apo–Mpro (violet), Simeprevir–Mpro complex (cyan), Ergotamine–Mpro (green), Bromocriptine–Mpro (blue), Tadalafil–Mpro (orange red) (b) loading plot from principal components analysis of the energy and structural data.
